name: Long-Shattered Vessel
description: Each and every fragment reflected from endless calamities is a seed of ruin harboring the will of destruction within.

skills.name: Mutual Sacrifice: Demise's Storm
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to one designated target and its adjacent targets.

skills.name: Mutual Sacrifice: Fading Fate
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to all targets. A portion of the hit target's reduced HP is converted to "<u>Corrosion</u>."

skills.name: Heed My Chants
skills.description: Resists Crowd Control debuffs. When "???" uses "Demise's Storm" or "Fading Fate" again, and if that attack summoned this unit, this unit will attack at the same time as "???" before being absorbed.

skills.name: Share In My Ritual
skills.description: After receiving a killing blow and if "???" is still in the <u>"Shackle Shatter"</u> state, instantly resummon this unit, but "???" loses 1 <u>"Calamity Power"</u> stack and Toughness is reduced.

skills.name: Plummeting Strike
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to one designated target.

skills.name: Return to Faded Ashes
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to one designated target. Then, become absorbed by "???," allowing them to gain 1 stack of <u>"Calamity Power"</u>.
